author: Discovery
description:
Watch these frighteningly close encounters with tornadoes and hurricanes from In The Eye of the Storm season 2, as eyewitnesses share their survival stories and jaw-dropping footage of the monster storms. 

Stream Full Episodes of In the Eye of the Storm:
https://www.discoveryplus.com/show/in-the-eye-of-the-storm-us

#Discovery #IntheEyeoftheStorm

About In the Eye of the Storm:
This series reveals recent natural disasters as they happened in real-time through footage captured by eyewitnesses who found themselves in the wrong place at the right time and boldly held up their camera phones to capture the eye of the storm.

Subscribe to Discovery:
https://www.youtube.com/@discovery

About Discovery: 
Dedicated to bringing our viewers amazing stories and experiences from the world of science, natural history, anthropology, survival, geography, and engineering.
